# The attempt to place the stone furnace failed again because it is still too far from my current position.
# It seems I need to check my current position and ensure that I am close enough to the desired placement location.

# I will inspect my current position to confirm where I am.
current_position = get_current_position()  # Get the current position of the player.
print(f"Current position: {current_position}")  # Print the current position to understand where I am. 

# After confirming my position, I will move closer to the desired placement location if necessary.
